name: OFF
summary: OFF is a French RPG game created in 2007 by Mortis Ghost and his team, Unproductive Fun Time, and translated into English in 2011. It is about a mysterious man known as The Batter, who is described being on an "important mission." The Batter then travels through four bizarre zones in the world, revealing more as the game goes on.
